text: Hugh Hefner was the teenage boy who
never grew up a pioneer of sexual
liberation in the 1960s money girls
night clubs a corporate jet called big
bunny all made possible by the magazine
he started at his kitchen table with
Marilyn Monroe as its first centerfold
playboy was an instant hit in its heyday
it sold seven million copies a month mr.
Hefner I suppose you're the world's most
famous hedonist certainly in a very
public way are you a happy man oh yeah
oh yeah never more happy than now Hugh
Hefner lived the lifestyle portrayed by
his magazine but feminists accused him
of reducing women to sexual objects
sales eventually dwindled and he retired
to his mansion where the partying
continued at the age of 86 he married
his third wife Crystal Harris a Playboy
Playmate 60 years his junior Hugh Hefner
wasn't all about sex he also published
some great writing and fought inequality
he died at the Playboy Mansion in LA
surrounded by friends the self-styled
Godfather of the sexual revolution James
Cook BBC News Los Angeles
